catalog_info.title: Intermediate Korean
catalog_info.notes: Classes meet five days a week, additional discussion sections to be arranged.
catalog_info.description: Continuation of elementary Korean to consolidate students' knowledge of the fundamental grammatical structures of Korean with an aim to increase their abilities to communicate using Korean in a wide range of daily-life transactional situations. After successful completion of second-year Korean, students are expected to handle most uncomplicated communicative tasks and social situations and read consistently with understanding of simple connected texts dealing with personal and social needs.
